desc: Tattoo Lovers Care products are formulated using only the highest quality, all-natural, cruelty-free and vegan ingredients. Our in-house, practicing pharmacists/herbalists have created our formulas with the goal of healing your tattoo quickly while also maintaining the color and clarity of precious tattoo inks.

layout.text: The Only Solution For Tattoo Aftercare and Beyond

Tattoo Lovers Care takes a holistic and natural approach to heal and preserve tattoos. We identified multiple stages of the healing process and selected premium all natural, vegan ingredients that support healing in each stage. Optimal healing preserves the integrity of the art.
